channel.title: Hyperion Chat Seems a bit Sluggish?
channel.description:
Hello all,
I am attempting to use the Hyperion base for rsps. The chat seems a bit...delayed...When One types something into the chat then presses enter, it seems about a second later it appears on the chatbox, it was unlike this when I tried typing in a blank delta.Everything else seems to be working at a 'normal' pace. Is there a fix for this?
Thanks
Sorry about all the questions lately, Im trying to get used to Hyperion.

item.title: Hyperion Chat Seems a bit Sluggish?
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

it could be that it queues the chat message for the next tick instead of immediately sending it to the clients

haven’t actually checked it though
